ygData.subject: Re: Trade of the Century..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... LOL - you really meant 45-50th bard for those items? Those items fall within those level ranges and are very acquireable by a NON-TWINKED bard at lvl 40+.
ygData.messageBody:
> side note: I think I'm in the top 5 for tactics/knowledge
> of my bard. I've seen L45-50 bards not know the first thing
> on how to play one. But they have mostly Mithril, FBSS, and
> two ykeshas, so that must make them badass (read: twinked).
>
> I'll be honest I'd rather have some nice magical instruments
> than try to pretend to be a warrior mini-me.
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk

LOL - you really meant 45-50th bard for those items? Those items fall within
those level ranges and are very acquireable by a NON-TWINKED bard at lvl
40+. Only thing I'm missin is FBSS, but i'm in no rush because my melee
output is not all that important, obviously.
You want to see twinked, inspect my secondary.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
Veeshan
